column1: # No detailed location in Moville is given. The grid reference provided is in the vicinity of St Columb's church.
# Observer Rev. Francis Smith moved to Moville from Londonderry in 1869.
# These readings, and those from Londonderry, are duplicated on rainfall sheets labelled as 'Stratford on Avon', also attributed to Rev. Smith.
# British Rainfall almanacs for the period attribute the readings to Rev. Smith at Londonderry/Moville, with nothing to match at Stratford on Avon.
# Rev. Smith was in the Londonderry/Moville area at this time, so the 'Stratford on Avon' rainfall sheets should almost certainly be disregarded.
